channel.title: PCB Capacitors on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in PCB Capacitors on SUPER-Lab

item.title: 27.12MHz GaN resonant power converter with PCB embedded resonant air core inductors and capacitors
item.description: This paper presents the design and implementation of a 27.12 MHz, 320 W, 170 V to 28 V dc-dc resonant power converter with resonant inductors and capacitors embedded into the Printed Circuit Board (PCB). Operating at 27.12 MHz allows for small value and size resonant passive components to be implemented using traces on or within a PCB. A prototype dc-dc converter was built to verify the concept and it reaches an efficiency of 73.6%. A simulated loss analysis is also presented.
